name: A Slime's Test for Intelligence
description:
A Slime's Test for Intelligence

Can an amorphous slime solve puzzles? Scientists seek to answer this question with a series of 22 problem-solving chambers. Use your squishy body to uncover the clever insights in each level and prove the capabilities of the humble slime. 

Many thanks to Clement Sparrow, the main developer of Pattern:Script, which this game was made with, and all the playtesters, especially Menderbug. The source code can be found in the "More information" dropdown.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys or WASD – Move
  • Spacebar or X – Select menu options
  • Z or U – Undo
  • R – Reset
  • Esc – Open pause menu
